hero.title: HUMBUG!
hero.subtitle: KNOW IT TILL YOU BLUFF IT
hero.description: A quiz party game where knowledge, courage, and deception collide!

section1.title: 1. Preparation
section1.content: HUMBUG! is a simple game that doesn't require any physical equipment, at most you need to keep track of lives and pass options. Only the game master needs to see the question "card", who reads the question aloud and verifies the answers. The game master can be anyone from the group and the role can be rotated between rounds.

section2.title: 2. Starting the Game
section2.content: Each round begins with the game master asking a quiz question to the entire team, which usually has at least a dozen correct answers. For example: "Name first names that have been held by US presidents throughout history!". The game master may only reveal the number of possible answers and the source of the question.

section3.title: 3. Players' Answers
section3.content: Players must take turns giving one possible answer that they think could be correct for the given question (for example: "George"). Unless a player has a pass option (see later), they must give an answer. If they don't know the answer, they can naturally bluff. The game master does not comment on the answers given, because the point is not whether the answer is correct or not, but whether anyone will call out the (potential) bluff!

section4.title: 4. The "Humbug!"
section4.content: A round ends when a player challenges the answer of someone before them by loudly saying "Humbug!" The game master then checks whether the questioned answer is correct or not.

section5.title: 5. Victory and Defeat
section5.content: If it was correct, the player who called the bluff loses a life, but if it was wrong, then logically the one who gave the incorrect answer loses. If the bluff call was correct, that player also gains a pass option, which they can use later at any time. Meaning when it's their turn, they can say pass and we skip their round. Players start with 1, 2, or 3 lives based on prior agreement. The winner is the one who remains "alive" last.

section6.title: 6. Alternative Game Mode
section6.content: With many players, the game can also be played so that a round does not end at the first bluff call. In this case, the still active players - meaning everyone except the player who gave the challenged answer and the player who called the bluff - continue until the second bluff call. In this case, 2 different players lose a life in that round.

features.title: What Makes HUMBUG! Special?
features.subtitle: HUMBUG! combines the excitement of classic quiz games with the art of psychological deception.

feature1.title: Knowledge vs. Bluff
feature1.description: It's not just about what you know, but also whether you can expose others' bluffs and keep your poker face

feature2.title: Any Player, Anywhere
feature2.description: Designed for 3-8 players, age 12+, perfect for friendly gatherings, even while traveling

feature3.title: Strategize and Win
feature3.description: Decide when to risk it, when to bluff, when to call someone out, and when to pass; every point counts

feature4.title: Simple Yet Deep
feature4.description: Learnable in 5 minutes, but deep enough to play "just another round..."

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: This privacy policy explains how the HUMBUG! Quiz Party Game web application collects, uses, and protects users' personal data. We are committed to protecting your data and complying with GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) requirements.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.content: The data controller and operator of this website is a private individual. Contact: humbugquiz@gmail.hu

auth.title: 1. Authentication data (Google OAuth)
auth.content: When you sign in with your Google account, we receive the following data:
auth.item3: Profile picture URL (from your Google profile)

gameState.title: 2. Game state data (localStorage)
gameState.content: To improve your gaming experience, we store locally in your browser:
gameState.item1: Card flip states (which cards you've flipped)

necessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function. They can be used without consent.
necessary.purpose: JWT session token, valid for 7 days, HTTPS only

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enhance the user experience. They require consent to be used.

legalBasis.title: Legal basis for processing
legalBasis.content: The legal basis for data processing is consent under Article 6(1)(a) GDPR. By signing in and accepting the cookie banner, you consent to the processing of your data. You can withdraw your consent at any time.

dataSharing.title: Sharing data with third parties
dataSharing.content: We share your data with the following service providers:
dataSharing.google: Used for OAuth authentication. Google Privacy Policy: https://policies.google.com/privacy
dataSharing.vercel: Hosting provider where the application runs. Vercel Privacy Policy: https://vercel.com/legal/privacy-policy

rights.title: Your rights (under GDPR)
rights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.access: Right to access: You can request a copy of your personal data
rights.rectification: Right to rectification: You can request correction of inaccurate data
rights.erasure: Right to erasure: You can request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")
rights.restrict: Right to restriction: You can request restriction of processing
rights.portability: Right to data portability: You can request your data in machine-readable format
rights.object: Right to object: You can object to the processing of your data
rights.withdraw: Right to withdraw consent: You can withdraw your consent at any time

retention.title: Data retention
retention.content: We retain your authentication data (JWT token) for 7 days. Your game state data (localStorage) is stored in your browser until you delete it or withdraw consent. When you sign out, the JWT token is deleted. When you withdraw cookie consent, functional data is deleted.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about privacy or want to exercise your rights, please contact us: humbug@humbug.hu

changes.title: Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. We will notify you of changes on this page. Last modified: 2025-10-16
